issue.title: [Python][CI] Exercise Python minimal build examples
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15893](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15893). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The build examples in https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/python/examples/minimal_build are currently not exercised, meaning they can silently start failing (which they actually did until https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12592 fixed them).
